page.title: 11Barton
page.content: {Barton}village is small. There is a farm and a teashop with a peacock. In the farm there is a dead crow hanging up because when the other crows see this they won't eat the crops. There are rows and rows and rows of vegetables.There were potatoes, beans, cabbages, radishes and carrots.They had a rose patch with all different kinds of roses. There is a wood on top of a hill. There is a{retirement}home. In{Barton their roads are very narrow. There is also a place to stay if you want{Bed and{Breakfast.} For a description of a typical house in the area see page 6.
